mapper.sql: id,user_id AS userId ,course_id AS courseId,user_name AS userName,phone,id_card AS idCard,company,man_count AS manCount,remark,status,create_time AS createTime,update_time as updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,c.course_name as courseName,a.user_name as userName,a.phone,a.id_card as idCard,a.company, a.man_count as manCount,a.remark,a.create_time as createTime, u.avatar,u.nick FROM db_apply a LEFT JOIN db_course c ON a.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN db_wxuser u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.`status`=1 order by a.create_time desc
